title: ［光復香港］照亮大地行動 Lights on

replies.msg:
呢排世界太黑暗，我覺得大家有需要、有責任去為呢個世界帶來光明、希望。同時，亦可以為同伴打打氣。

希望大家夜晚出街返屋企時用手機開電筒，照著前方大地（不是向人）。尤其是10點附近手足嗌緊，自己一個喺街唔方便嗌，可以以示支持。被截查，都唔需要怕，因為可以有好多原因開左電筒（跌嘢、唔小心開咗、影相），亦完全唔構成任何生理影響。

我覺得喺一個好和平宣洩，亦都可以帶出我哋係想帶來光明、希望，站在公義一方。

如果大家有任何意見，歡迎提出，旨在俾多一種形式讓手足參與。

The world is too dark. I think we are responsible to bring brightness and hope. Meanwhile, we could give companion a boost up.

Hope that we could open the torch of our phone to lighten the road (not pointing at people). Especially when it is around 10 pm, we could support the screaming event by doing so. If we were questioned by popo, we don’t need to be afraid because there are tons of reasons to open the torch, like searching, taking photos and totally not harmful to anyone.

I think it would be a peaceful way to express our discontentment. And it would be symbolic that we bring brightness, hope, justice.

If anyone have other opinions, please share. This is only another form to let people participate.

Sorry for poor English writing skills. Please do not focus on the grammar.
一個人做可能好on9，希望多啲人去參與
